column1: São Lourenço da Mata is a city located in the greater Recife metropolitan area in the state of Pernambuco
column3: 362 inhabitants (2018 estimate by IBGE). The city was one of the hosts of the 2014 FIFA World Cup together with Recife. The new Arena Cidade da Copa is set to boost the local economy with the construction of a new stadium

column4: Vitória de Santo Antão and Chã de Alegria (W)

column1: The main economic activities in São Lourenço da Mata are based in general industry
column2: especially the electrical and transportation sectors.
